name: Quick Fill
description: Quickly fill a rectangle in the editor.

use-obj-2.name: Use Object 2
use-obj-2.description: Uses object 2's id and properties instead of object 1's

copy-values.name: Copy Values
copy-values.description: Whether to copy values like groups and rotation or not when filling.

dont-use-workaround.name: Don't Use Copy Values
dont-use-workaround.description: To copy object settings this mod uses the in-game copy/paste state buttons, if you don't want your copied state getting messed up, turn this on (most values will not be preserved with this setting on)
